message: Let's split it evenly to start, and we can reassess from here.
I'll take the majority, you can have a smaller share, let's move on
You wanted the majority last round, now it's my turn to propose a more balanced split.

I'm willing to take a risk and propose a more uneven split, but I need a bigger share to make it worth my while.

I'm running out of patience, Bob. I need a much bigger share to make this deal worthwhile.
